body_html:
@kyokke-viola Yes, but repackaging takes much time than i can afford now. To resolve this, you may check the two conditions below.

  1. If your root environment is broken(activate/deactivate don't work), use conda update -f conda.
  2. If your virtual environment is broken, then try creating a new one that share the same python version with it, and copy the files in Scripts in the new env into the old env.
